para.text: Lists the required security schemes to execute this operation. The object can have multiple security schemes declared in it which are all required (that is, there is a logical AND between the schemes).
The name used for each property MUST correspond to a security scheme declared in the

para.text: Each name must correspond to a security scheme which is declared in the
. If the security scheme is of type
, then the value is a list of scope names required for the execution. For other security scheme types, the array MUST be empty.
